changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- character info.
SELECT c.nickname, c.class, c.zone_id, c.pos_x, c.pos_y, c.pos_z, c.pos_heading, c.sex, c.current_level, c.level_step, c.exp, c.sp, c.hp, c.mp, c.cp, c.recovery_cp, c.character_state, c.chaotic, c.is_actionbar_lock, c.mercenary_point, ISNULL(gm.guild_id, 0) FROM dbo.Characters AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN Guild_Members AS gm ON c.id = gm.character_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Guilds AS g ON g.id = gm.guild_id WHERE c.id = @character_id
-- Quest Item SELECT id, quest_item_code, usable_count, quest_code FROM dbo.Quest_Inventories WHERE character_id = @character_id
-- inventory SELECT inven_type, id, item_code, slot_id, item_count FROM dbo.Inventories WHERE character_id = @character_id
-- equip item SELECT inven_type, inventory_id, fragment_count, open_socket_count, socket_skill_code_1, socket_skill_code_2, socket_skill_code_3, socket_skill_code_4, socket_skill_code_5 FROM dbo.EquipItemInfos WHERE character_id = @character_id
-- equipment SELECT equip_part, inventory_id FROM dbo.Equipments WHERE character_id = @character_id
-- skill SELECT skill_code FROM dbo.Skills WHERE character_id = @character_id
-- action bar SELECT code_0, code_1, code_2, code_3, code_4, code_5, code_6, code_7, code_8, code_9 FROM dbo.ActionBars WHERE character_id = @character_id ORDER BY count_id
-- game money SELECT game_money, bank_game_money FROM dbo.GameMonies WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info GO
